name: Robot Smashing Simulator
description:
Test old armored hypercraft in simulated enviroment by smashing some robots. Leaving bounds of simulation results in administrated fire damage. And don't get kicked.

Controls: 

  • W A S D - Direction movement (Also arrows and probably joystick, haven't tested jet)
  • Space - Boost

Known Bug: Sometimes one type of large robot is invisible, couldn't find why jet.
